articles.title: Fossil reveals burrowing lifestyle of tiny dino, Europe News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: PARIS (AFP) - A finger-sized fossil from 308 million years ago unearthed in the United States gives tantalising clues to the habits of tiny dinosaur-like creatures that may be the forerunners of reptiles, researchers revealed Wednesday (July 21).. Read more a…
